short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic labeling of Mixins as uninteresting content. Works for recommendations and home page. Supported langages: English, Russian

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This package automatically parses videos on YouTube's suggestion page and marks videos of no interest - Mixes. Works also with videos that are added while scrolling. This will make your YouTube recommendations cleaner and get rid of auto-collected playlists.
